::Autofire/Scavenger::

"You jumped in front of a plasma shot and got yourself slagged. Conflict is over, we're heading back to base." Autofire summarizes the situation, approaching the Dark Avian.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Scavenger flies off after the other constructicons, glancing nerviously at Hovotron.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., gunthers@t... wrote:
> Firestrike looked up, finally awakening to the sound of Autofires 
> voice.  "What- wh- happened. out there."  he said, back to his loyal 
> self.
